def_cn: 行动自由的人;无需承担任何责任的人
def_en: If you say that someone is a free agent, you are emphasizing that they can do whatever they want to do, because they are not responsible to anyone or for anyone.

def_cn: (可以同任何球队签约的)自由职业运动员
def_en: If a sports player is a free agent, he or she is free to sign a contract with any team.
